name: Adlib Tracker II Pattern File
summary: Learn about .A2P files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Other related AdLib Tracker II song format files include .A2M and .A2T.
NOTE: Adlib Tracker II is a DOS program but should run on any Windows platform.

description: File created with Adlib Tracker II, an 18-channel FM tracking program; contains compressed pattern data used for track and musical score samples; also holds data regarding the format version and file authenticity.
